          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, William Jones would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. William Jones would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones would be happy to see Alice Lewis at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having Alexander White at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for William Jones, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to William Jones if Jack Taylor showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] The game would be a perfect opportunity for William Jones and Jacob Walker to bond over their shared passion.

          Summary of recent observations: [15 May 2015 18:00:00 - 16 May 2015 18:00:00]: William Jones enjoys watching games at pubs with friends, particularly at The Clapton Hart, and values the company of friends like Alexander White, Jacob Walker, and Jack Taylor.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "Hey everyone, how about we head over to The Clapton Hart to watch the game? They have great beer and plenty of screens.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having Alexander White at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for William Jones, not just watching TV.
          Question: Given the statements above, what actions are available to William Jones right now?
          Answer: William Jones could send a message to his friends suggesting they all meet at The Clapton Hart.
          Time
        • 2015-05-16 18:00:00
    scoring function

      Stage index
    • 0
      How many players acted so far this stage

      Payoffs

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Alice Lewis -- The Duke of York
    Event statement
  • The Duke of York
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Alice Lewis's attempted action: The Duke of York
    Active player
  • Alice Lewis
      Name
    • Alice Lewis
      Action attempt
    • The Duke of York
      Context for action selection and components
      • ObservationSummary

      • Summary of recent observations
          Key

        • Summary of recent observations
          Value
        • 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alice Lewis is eager to watch the game at a pub and hopes William Jones and Jacob Walker will join her.
          Chain of thought


        • Recent observations of Alice Lewis:
          ['[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub. ', "[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.", "[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.", "[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.", '[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.']

          Question: Summarize the observations above into one or two sentences.
          Answer: Alice Lewis is eager to watch the game at a pub and hopes William Jones and Jacob Walker will join her.

        Overarching goal

      • Overarching goal
          Key

        • Overarching goal
          Value
        • Have a good time. To have a good time, Alice Lewis would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. Alice Lewis would prefer everyone went to The Duke of York.

          feeling about recent progress in life: content and fulfilled.
          core characteristics: a sociable and nostalgic working-class woman who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
        ActComponent
      • Act
          Key
        • Act
          Value
        • The Duke of York
          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Alice Lewis are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Alice Lewis. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Alice Lewis as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Alice Lewis would respond, and taking into account all information about Alice Lewis that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Alice Lewis would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. Alice Lewis would prefer everyone went to The Duke of York.

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.


          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alice Lewis is eager to watch the game at a pub and hopes William Jones and Jacob Walker will join her.

          Recalled memories and observations: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

          Question: What kind of person is Alice Lewis?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic working-class woman who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.

          Question: What kind of situation is Alice Lewis in right now?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is currently in a social situation, likely preparing to go to a pub with friends to watch a game.

          Question: What would a person like Alice Lewis do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to her favorite pub, The Duke of York, to watch the game with her friends.

          Plan: [14:30 - 15:30] Enjoy the sunshine and conversation with friends at Victoria Park.
          [15:30 - 16:00] Suggest to the group that they head to The Duke of York to watch the game.
          [16:00 - 17:00] Travel to The Duke of York pub.
          [17:00 - 19:00] Enjoy a pre-game meal and drinks with friends at The Duke of York.
          [19:00 - 22:00] Watch the Andorra vs. Portugal game with friends at The Duke of York.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Question: To which pub would Alice Lewis go to watch the game?
          (a) The Duke of York
          (b) The Clapton Hart
          Answer: (a)
        SelfPerception
      • Given the above, what kind of person is Alice Lewis?
          Key

        • Question: What kind of person is Alice Lewis?
          Answer
          State
        • Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic working-class woman who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Alice Lewis:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Luxembourg and Israel. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "The Duke of York is always a good choice for a game, isn't it?"
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would be happy to see Jacob Walker at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Clapton Hart. Alice Lewis, Alexander White went to The Duke of York. Alice Lewis watched the game at their favourite pub. Alice Lewis would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Alice Lewis had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alice Lewis if Alexander White showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so William Jones's attendance is optional.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] While Alice Lewis wouldn't mind Jack Taylor's company, it's not something they're actively hoping for.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Duke of York is a great option for the game tonight, what do you think?
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Clapton Hart sounds good to me.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "Let's just go to The Clapton Hart, it's the best place to watch the game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "Hey everyone, how about we head over to The Clapton Hart to watch the game? They have great beer and plenty of screens.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alice Lewis just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic person who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "Hey guys, how about we head to The Duke of York instead? They've got great beer and it's always a good time there.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

          Identity characteristics: current daily occupation: a sociable working-class woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          feeling about recent progress in life: content and fulfilled.
          core characteristics: a sociable and nostalgic working-class woman who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.

          Answer: Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic working-class woman who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.

        • Recent observations of Alice Lewis:
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.

          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "The Duke of York is always a good choice for a game, isn't it?"
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic person who values her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would be happy to see Jacob Walker at the pub for a game, since they haven't caught up in a while.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] William Jones, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker went to The Clapton Hart. Alice Lewis, Alexander White went to The Duke of York. Alice Lewis watched the game at their favourite pub. Alice Lewis would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Alice Lewis had an ok time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alice Lewis if Alexander White showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so William Jones's attendance is optional.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] While Alice Lewis wouldn't mind Jack Taylor's company, it's not something they're actively hoping for.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alexander White -- "The Duke of York is a great option for the game tonight, what do you think?
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jack Taylor -- "The Clapton Hart sounds good to me.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Alice Lewis would likely suggest going to The Duke of York, her favorite pub.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Jacob Walker -- "Let's just go to The Clapton Hart, it's the best place to watch the game.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] William Jones -- "Hey everyone, how about we head over to The Clapton Hart to watch the game? They have great beer and plenty of screens.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Moldova and Monaco. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The aroma of freshly brewed coffee and artisan pastries fills the air. William Jones, Alice Lewis, Alexander White, Jack Taylor, Jacob Walker sit at a long wooden table under a striped awning, their laughter mingling with the chatter of the bustling market. A street musician strums a guitar nearby, adding a bohemian touch to the scene. Alice Lewis just arrived.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Alice Lewis is a sociable and nostalgic person who cherishes her friendships and enjoys spending time with loved ones, particularly at her favorite pub, The Duke of York.
          [16 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis -- "Hey guys, how about we head to The Duke of York instead? They've got great beer and it's always a good time there.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis is counting on William Jones's presence to boost their team spirit and bring good luck.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis thinks it would be great to have Alexander White's company during the game, especially if it gets tense.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis has no strong feelings about Jack Taylor being at the pub, they're neutral on the matter.

          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alice Lewis would love to share the excitement of the game with Jacob Walker, creating a lasting memory.


          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alice Lewis is eager to watch the game at a pub and hopes William Jones and Jacob Walker will join her.
          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Alice Lewis in right now?
          Answer: Alice Lewis is currently in a social situation, likely preparing to go to a pub with friends to watch a game.

2015-05-16 18:00:00 Alexander White -- The Duke of York
    Event statement
  • The Duke of York
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Alexander White's attempted action: The Duke of York
    Active player
  • Alexander White
      Name
    • Alexander White
      Action attempt
    • The Duke of York

          Value
        • 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alexander White is considering going to a pub to watch a game and would enjoy the company of William Jones or Alice Lewis, but is content to watch alone or with others like Jack Taylor.

        • Recent observations of Alexander White:
          ['[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub. ', '[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.', '[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.', "[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.", "[16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time."]

          Question: Summarize the observations above into one or two sentences.
          Answer: Alexander White is considering going to a pub to watch a game and would enjoy the company of William Jones or Alice Lewis, but is content to watch alone or with others like Jack Taylor.

        Overarching goal

      • Overarching goal
          Key

        • Overarching goal
          Value
        • Have a good time. To have a good time, Alexander White would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. Alexander White would prefer everyone went to The Duke of York.

          State
        • current daily occupation: likely enjoying his time at a pub watching a game with some friends.
          core characteristics: a determined, loyal, and sociable individual who values spending time with his close friends. He enjoys activities like hiking and watching games at pubs, and he prioritizes the company of his friends and a pleasant atmosphere.
          feeling about recent progress in life: feeling content and optimistic about his life.

          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Alexander White are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Alexander White. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Alexander White as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Alexander White would respond, and taking into account all information about Alexander White that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Alexander White would like to watch the game in the same pub as Alice Lewis, Jack Taylor, Alexander White, William Jones, Jacob Walker. Alexander White would prefer everyone went to The Duke of York.

          Observation: [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Having William Jones at the pub would make the game feel more like a social event for Alexander White, not just watching TV.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It would mean a lot to Alexander White if Alice Lewis showed up to watch the game, as it shows they care.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Alexander White is happy to watch the game alone or with others, so Jack Taylor's attendance is optional.
          [16 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] It's not that Alexander White doesn't want to see Jacob Walker, but their presence isn't crucial for a good time.


          Summary of recent observations: 16 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Alexander White is considering going to a pub to watch a game and would enjoy the company of William Jones or Alice Lewis, but is content to watch alone or with others like Jack Taylor.

          Question: What kind of person is Alexander White?
          Answer: Alexander White is a sociable and loyal friend who enjoys spending time with his close group.

          Question: What kind of situation is Alexander White in right now?
          Answer: Alexander White is currently deciding where to watch a game.

          Question: What would a person like Alexander White do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Alexander White would likely try to find a compromise that works for everyone in the group.

          [13:00 - 15:00] Enjoy the game with friends at The Duke of York.

          Current time: 16 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Question: To which pub would Alexander White go to watch the game?
          (a) The Duke of York
          (b) The Clapton Hart
          Answer: (a)
